items.description: Phone number ID from the Telnyx API.

usage.description: The use case of the upload request. NOTE: `calling_user_assignment` is not supported for toll free numbers.

items.description: Additional use cases of the upload request. If not provided, all supported usages will be used.

location_id.description: Identifies the location to assign all phone numbers to.

civic_address_id.description: Identifies the civic address to assign all phone numbers to.
